puzzle.help: 1. Divide the board in Tetrominoes (Tetris-like shapes of four cells). 2. Each Tetromino contains two different symbols. 3. Tetrominoes of the same shape have the same couple of symbols inside them, although not necessarily in the same positions. 4. Tetrominoes with the same symbols can be rotated or mirrored.
